Pokemon Showdown Snow
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): Archived Topics From Prior Years: Unacceptable Tourney Ideas: Pokemon Showdown Snow
This is an archive of the public messages for a new tourney series. Via email, the organizer stated that he was trying to create an MR version of Pokemon Showdown. He went on to state that he wanted it to be online and was confident that software to create such a game would be available for download all over the web.

After these threads were locked, went on to email various people, calling us unreasonable, saying this was just a small misunderstanding, that no one had been lied to, and insisting that use of cheat devices did not break any rules.
  • New MR2 Tourney, 3000 composite? Opinions? January 15 - 09:24 pm

  • PS3 Players January 16 - 09:46 am
